subject: Re: [junit] Q : JUNIT : Java.lang.IllegalAccessError
msgSnippet: So said  Vishal Goyal  on  2002-12-19 -------------------- ... Java.lang.IllegalAccessError ... It is impossible to provide a pointer without seeing the code.
messageBody:
So said Vishal Goyal on 2002-12-19 --------------------

>Hi ,
>I am writing six test methods in a Test class.
>
>While compiling it is giving me this error
Java.lang.IllegalAccessError
>: class <sun.reflect.GeneratedConstructorAccessor5 cannot access its
>superclass sun.reflect.ConstructorAccessorImpl>.
>
>Please provide some pointer.

It is impossible to provide a pointer without seeing the code. Thanks.

J. B. Rainsberger,
